final_answer.precision_note: 1 whole-number result from integer bond counts; treat mean bond energies as given.

method: Use the bond-energy Hess estimate: energy required to break bonds minus energy released in forming bonds. For reactants, break all C–H and O=O bonds listed in the reaction equation. For products, form C=O bonds in CO2 and O–H bonds in water. Sum each side and take ΔH = sum(broken) − sum(formed), keeping the sign convention from the equation provided.
